short_summary: Boiler room maintenance at the Quebec base as described in Annex A
description: Providing boiler room maintenance services at the Quebec base located in Quebec, Canada
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title 
EE517-240141 Boiler Room Maintenance - Quebec Base

#### Reference Number
WS4106915360

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date** : July 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date** : August 22, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : August 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date** : August 31, 2024

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category** : Service
* **Procurement Method** : Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements** : World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and others (please refer to original document)

#### Location
The tender is open to proponents who can provide service for the boiler room maintenance at the Fisheries and Oceans Canada located in Quebec, Canada.

#### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada.

#### End-User Entity
The end-user entity for this tender is the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

#### Contact Information

* **Name** : Julien Ratte
* **Email** : julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

You can find more information and documentation by visiting the following URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16973372?extsite=MTY5NzMzNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Please note that the above tender has expired and is no longer accessible for submission.

---

The rewritten entry uses proper business English, is direct, and concise, while providing all the necessary details in 400 words.
